greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of a constant related to A251702.
mathematica: exact = 20; terms = 200; b = ConstantArray[0, terms]; b[[1]] = N[Log[5], 100]; Do[b[[n]] = b[[n - 1]] + If[n > exact, b[[n - 1]], Log[Exp[b[[n - 1]]] - 1]] + If[n > exact, b[[n - 1]], Log[Exp[b[[n - 1]]] - 2]] - Log[6], {n, 2, terms}]; Do[Print[Exp[b[[n]]/3^n]], {n, 1, Length[b]}] (* after _Jon E. Schoenfield_ *)
program: (MAGMA) nMax:=160; nExactMax:=20; DP:=100; R:=RealField(DP); SetDefaultRealField(R); logA:=[Log(5.0)]; for n in [2..nMax] do logAprev:=logA[n-1]; if n le nExactMax then Aprev:=Exp(logAprev); logA[n]:=logAprev + Log(Aprev-1) + Log(Aprev-2) - Log(6); else logA[n]:=3*logAprev - Log(6); end if; t:=Exp((1/3^n)*logA[n]); n, ChangePrecision(t,72); end for; // _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Dec 09 2014
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_ and _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Dec 09 2014
